numericalresponse.p: Consider a newsvendor problem with purchase price c, sales price (revenue per unit) r, salvage value s and demand given by a triangular distribution with parameters a, b, and \( m=\frac{a+b}{2} \)
numericalresponse.description: How many newspapers should the vendor buy? (You are not asked to solve this problem, but understanding the idea is essential. Enter 1 and submit to see the solution)
